mapper.select: SELECT m.ID, m.NAME, m.COMPANY_NAME, m.POST_NAME, m.YEARS, m.SIGNATURE, m.INTRODUCE, MEMBER_IMG, WECHAT, PHONE FROM BX_MEMBER m where m.WECHAT=#{wechat}
SELECT m.ID, m.NAME, m.COMPANY_NAME, m.POST_NAME, m.YEARS, m.SIGNATURE, m.INTRODUCE, MEMBER_IMG, WECHAT, PHONE FROM BX_MEMBER m where m.id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE BX_MEMBER SET USER_NAME = #{userName} , USER_PASSWORD = #{userPassword} , NAME = #{name}, COMPANY_NAME = #{company_name}, POST_NAME = #{post_name}, YEARS = #{years}, SIGNATURE = #{signature}, INTRODUCE = #{introduce}, PHONE = #{phone}, MEMBER_IMG = #{memberImg}, ROLE_ID = #{roleId} , MANAGEDEPART = #{manageDepart} , DEPARTCLASS = #{departClass} , USER_REALNAME = #{userRealname} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BX_MEMBER ( USER_NAME , USER_PASSWORD , NAME, COMPANY_NAME, POST_NAME, YEARS, SIGNATURE, INTRODUCE, MEMBER_IMG, WECHAT, PHONE, CREATE_DATE, STATUS, CREATER_ID, ROLE_ID , MANAGEDEPART , DEPARTCLASS , USER_REALNAME ) VALUES ( #{userName} , #{userPassword} , #{name} , #{company_name}, #{post_name}, #{years}, #{signature}, #{introduce}, #{memberImg}, #{wechat}, #{phone}, now() , 0 , #{createrId}, #{roleId} , #{manageDepart} , #{departClass} , #{userRealname} )
